TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMoniker

summary.span: 提供 接口的托管定义，具有 和 中的 COM 功能。

span.span: Provides the managed definition of the interface, with COM functionality from and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息`IMoniker`， `IPersist`，和`IPersistStream`接口，请参阅 MSDN 库。For more information about the `IMoniker`, `IPersist`, and `IPersistStream` interfaces, see the MSDN Library. 在本机代码中的 COM 方法将返回的 HRESULT 时，公共语言运行时将引发异常。The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. 有关更多信息，请参见 [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

span.span: When this method returns, contains a reference to the interface requested by .

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 使用名字对象绑定到它所标识的对象。

span.span: Uses the moniker to bind to the object that it identifies.

span.span: Returns a reduced moniker, which is another moniker that refers to the same object as the current moniker but can be bound with equal or greater efficiency.
